title: Spiroll
author: Spiroll
content: Hello everyone! Proud to introduce our coin flip game developed on the BNB Chain network! We are aware of our shortcomings in the interface. Our development process is still ongoing, but our playable version is active now. Coming soon with more games. We would be very pleased if you could review and inform us about our shortcomings. We are waiting your ideas!https://spiroll.app

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: Quote from: Spiroll on November 27, 2022, 06:06:06 PMhttps://spiroll.appWelcome to the forum. Since this is an alternative chain than Bitcoin, I do not think moderators will keep it in this board. As far as I understand, it's only for bitcoin projects.Anyway, since the site development has a lot to be done, I will keep an eye. In the mean time, if you are planning for bitcointalk promotion then feel free to reach out to me. I can assist you in bitcointalk affairs.Good luck.

comments.author: Techdev
comments.body: Quote from: Royse777 on November 27, 2022, 06:33:48 PMQuote from: Spiroll on November 27, 2022, 06:06:06 PMhttps://spiroll.appWelcome to the forum. Since this is an alternative chain than Bitcoin, I do not think moderators will keep it in this board. As far as I understand, it's only for bitcoin projects.Anyway, since the site development has a lot to be done, I will keep an eye. In the mean time, if you are planning for bitcointalk promotion then feel free to reach out to me. I can assist you in bitcointalk affairs.Good luck.You're wrong...this is the alternate cryptocurrency board. Can't be removed.
